pages.text: 15|92|geudae junim-ui ileum-eulo hana nim-eun geudeul moduege jilmunhasinila
15|94|geuleomeulo geudaega myeonglyeongbad-eun geos-eul seon-eonhadoe bulsinjadeullobuteo meollihala
15|96|hananimkke daleun sin-eul biyuha neun ja geudeul-eun god alge doelila
15|97|geudeul-i geojishaneun geos-eulo geu daeui ma-eum-i geunsimdoem-eul algo issna ni
15|98|geuleona geudaeui junim-eul chanmi hago eopdeulyeo buboghaneun ja jung-e iss-eula
15|99|geudaeui junim-eul gyeongbaehala hwag silhan geunal-i geudaeege olila
16|1|hananim-ui myeonglyeong-i gakkaoni seodulleo guhaji malgeos-imyeo geubun-eul yeong gwangdoege hago geubun-eul daejeoghaneun mo deungeos wie issge hala hasigo

16|2|cheonsadeul-eul tonghayeo geubun-i wonhasineun seonjijadeul-ege myeonglyeong-ui malsseum eul bonaesa na oeeneun sin-i eobsda neun geos-eul gyeong-gohago naleul gyeong-oehala neun malsseum-i iss-eossdeola
16|3|geubunkkeseo jinlilo cheonjileul changjo hasyeoss-euni geubunman-i geudeul-i biyuha neun modeungeos wie gyesinola
16|4|ingan-eul hanbang-ul-ui jeong-aeg-eulo chang johasyeoss-eumae bola ajigdo geuneun non jaenghago issdeola
16|5|neohuileul wihae gachugdeul-eul changjo hasyeoss-euni geu an-eneun ongiga iss-eo yuyonghamyeo ttohan geugeos-eulo il-yonghal yangsig-eul seobchwihadoda
16|6|neohuiga geu gachugdeul-eul jib-eulo delyeool ttaewa mogjang-eulo annaehaneun geu an-eneun neohuileul wihan aleumdaum i iss-eumyeo
